other_tests.findings: Detected an occipital meningocele sized 14 mm × 11 mm × 11 mm, which later showed interval increase in size.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Interval increase in the size of the occipital meningocele.

other_tests.findings: Confirmed an occipital meningocele measuring 11 mm × 27 mm × 16 mm and noted ventriculomegaly.
Showed a 20 mm × 18 mm × 25 mm cystic lesion at midline of occipital region.
Revealed another cystic lesion at the retrocerebellar region.
